statements: SELECT * FROM budget_info;
SELECT grant_id, proposal_title FROM budget_info;
SELECT budget_amount FROM budget_info WHERE grant_id = 1;
SELECT grant_id, proposal_title, budget_amount FROM budget_info ORDER BY grant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_info WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT grant_id, proposal_title, budget_amount FROM budget_info WHERE grant_id = 1001;
SELECT budget_amount, grant_id, proposal_title FROM budget_info WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM budget_info ORDER BY proposal_title DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM budget_info;
SELECT grant_id, proposal_title, budget_amount FROM budget_info WHERE proposal_title LIKE '%research%';
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT proposal_title, grant_amount FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_details WHERE expense_category='Travel';
SELECT proposal_title, submission_date FROM grant_proposals WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT proposal_title, expense_category, expense_amount FROM grant_proposals JOIN budget_details ON grant_proposals.proposal_id = budget_details.proposal_id;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT proposal_title, grant_amount FROM grant_proposals WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT proposal_title, expense_category, expense_amount FROM grant_proposals JOIN budget_details ON grant_proposals.proposal_id = budget_details.proposal_id WHERE expense_category = 'Travel';
SELECT proposal_title, proposal_description FROM grant_proposals WHERE LENGTH(proposal_description) > 200 ORDER BY proposal_id ASC;
SELECT proposal_title, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM grant_proposals JOIN budget_details ON grant_proposals.proposal_id = budget_details.proposal_id GROUP BY grant_proposals.proposal_id;
SELECT grant_id, title FROM GrantProposals WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT grant_id, title, amount FROM GrantProposals WHERE submit_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM BudgetBreakdown WHERE item_amount < 500;
SELECT grant_id, item_name, item_amount FROM BudgetBreakdown WHERE item_name LIKE '%equipment%';
SELECT comment_id, commenter_name, comment_text FROM ProposalComments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GrantProposals;
SELECT title, amount FROM GrantProposals WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT grant_id, title, amount, submit_date FROM GrantProposals WHERE submit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT GrantProposals.title, BudgetBreakdown.item_name, BudgetBreakdown.item_amount FROM GrantProposals INNER JOIN BudgetBreakdown ON GrantProposals.grant_id = BudgetBreakdown.grant_id WHERE BudgetBreakdown.item_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ProposalComments WHERE comment_id IN (SELECT MAX(comment_id) FROM ProposalComments);
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_title, proposal_description FROM grant_proposals WHERE proposal_id = 1
SELECT * FROM proposal_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT proposal_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM proposal_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT proposal_title, proposal_budget FROM grant_proposals WHERE proposal_budget > 5000 ORDER BY proposal_budget
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals WHERE proposal_id = 5;
SELECT proposal_title, proposal_budget FROM grant_proposals WHERE proposal_budget > 10000;
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_title, proposal_budget FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY proposal_budget DESC;
SELECT p.proposal_id, p.proposal_title, r.reviewer_name, r.review_date FROM grant_proposals p JOIN proposal_reviews r ON p.proposal_id = r.proposal_id;
SELECT p.proposal_id, p.proposal_title, s.status FROM grant_proposals p JOIN proposal_status s ON p.proposal_id = s.proposal_id WHERE s.status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT org_name, org_address FROM organizations WHERE org_contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount, grant_deadline FROM grants ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_category = 'Travel' ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_deadline DESC;
SELECT org_name, org_contact_person, org_address FROM organizations WHERE org_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT budget_category, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM budgets GROUP BY budget_category HAVING total_budget > 10000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;

SELECT grant_title, expense_amount, expense_description FROM grants JOIN budgets ON grants.grant_id = budgets.grant_id JOIN expenses ON budgets.budget_id = expenses.budget_id WHERE expense_amount < 2000 ORDER BY grant_title ASC, expense_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
